SELECT js.job_id, js.job_genre, js.job_content_title, js.job_deadline, js.created_at, js.user_id, u.user_profile_img, u.user_career, u.user_nickname, COALESCE(c.comment_count, 0) AS comment_count, COALESCE(v.view_count, 0) AS view_count FROM job_search js INNER JOIN user u ON js.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT job_id, COUNT(comment_id) AS comment_count FROM comment WHERE comment_status != 'deleted' GROUP BY job_id ) c ON js.job_id = c.job_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT job_id, COUNT(view_id) AS view_count FROM view GROUP BY job_id ) v ON js.job_id = v.job_id WHERE js.user_id = #{userId} AND js.job_status != 'deleted'
